Without prompt intervention, hyperammonemia and the accumulation of other toxic metabolites result in swelling of the brain, breathing problems, increased or decreased muscle tone, muscle weakness, problems staying warm, seizures, loss of consciousness, and sometimes death. Without treatment, most babies die within the first few weeks of life.",GARD,Citrullinemia type I
What is (are) Turner syndrome ?,"Turner syndrome is a chromosomal disorder
